Module com.reese.mla

Class FileOps

java.lang.Object
com.reese.mla.FileOps
public class FileOps extends Object
This class houses only static methods, of which are File operations as well as SQL operations

  • Constructor Details

      public FileOps()

  • Method Details

    • initializeDB

      public static int initializeDB(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Movie> list, ConnectionToPass connection, String url, String user, String password, String pathToDb)
      This initializes the DB connection as well as fills in the list with information from the DB
      Parameters:
      list - This is the list that holds all the movies
      connection - This is the ConnectionToPass that stores the current connection.
      url - This is the full URL for the SQL connection
      user - This is the username for the SQL connection
      password - This is the password for the SQL connection
      pathToDb - This is the path to a SQL file
      Returns:
      Success Status:
      • 0 if successful
      • 1 if SQL Error
      • 2 for IOE Error

    • importFromSQL

      public static void importFromSQL(ConnectionToPass connection, String pathToDb) throws IOException, SQLException
      This connects to the DB and then writes to the DB from a SQL file
      Parameters:
      connection - This is the ConnectionToPass that stores the current connection.
      pathToDb - This is the path to a SQL file
      Throws:
      IOException - Handle the IO exception for if path to file is impossible to retrieve
      SQLException - Handle a SQL error, likely Bad Connection info

    • updateDB

      public static void updateDB(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Movie> list, ConnectionToPass connection)
      This is called at the end of the program so ensure that whenever the user closes the application changes are saved.
      Parameters:
      list - This is the list that holds all the movies
      connection - This is the ConnectionToPass that stores the current connection.
